MP_BC_tot.comment: positive mass of BC_tot in kg
MP_BC_tot.long_name: total mass of black carbon (sum of all aerosol modes)

MP_CH4.comment: positive mass of CH4 in kg

MP_CO.comment: positive mass of CO in kg

MP_CO2.comment: positive mass of CO2 in kg

MP_DU_tot.comment: positive mass of DU_tot in kg
MP_DU_tot.long_name: total mass of mineral dust (sum of all aerosol modes)

MP_N2O.comment: positive mass of N2O in kg

MP_NH3.comment: positive mass of NH3 in kg

MP_NO.comment: positive mass of NO in kg

MP_NO2.comment: positive mass of NO2 in kg

MP_NOX.comment: positive mass of NOX in kg

MP_O3.comment: positive mass of O3 in kg

MP_OH.comment: positive mass of OH in kg

MP_S.comment: positive mass of S in kg

MP_SO2.comment: positive mass of SO2 in kg

MP_SO4mm_tot.comment: positive mass of SO4mm_tot in kg
MP_SO4mm_tot.long_name: total mass of aerosol sulfate (sum of all aerosol modes)

MP_SS_tot.comment: positive mass of SS_tot in kg
MP_SS_tot.long_name: total mass of sea salt (sum of all aerosol modes)

agb.comment: Amount of living biomass (organic matter) stored in vegetation above the soil including stem, stump, branches, bark, seeds and foliage, expressed as dry weight

albDiff.long_name: Difference in surface albedo for a given vegetation cover transition

albDiffiTr13.long_name: Difference in Surface Albedo for Vegetation Cover Transition from Forest to Crops and Grasses

amoc.comment: AMOC at the Rapid array (26.5 N)

awhea.comment: global mean net surface heat flux over open water
awhea.long_name: Global Mean Net Surface Heat Flux Over Open Water

bdalb.long_name: Broadband directional albedo at the surface

bhalb.long_name: Broadband bihemispherical albedo at the surface

ch4s.comment: As ch4, but only at the surface

chlora.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chlora.comment: calculated at the surface (to be compared with satellite measurements)

clhmtisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
clhmtisccp.long_name: ISCCP High Level Medium-Thickness Cloud Area Fraction

clhtkisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
clhtkisccp.long_name: ISCCP high level thick cloud area fraction

cllmtisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
cllmtisccp.long_name: ISCCP Low Level Medium-Thickness Cloud Area Fraction

clltkisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
clltkisccp.long_name: ISCCP low level thick cloud area fraction

clmmtisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
clmmtisccp.long_name: ISCCP Middle Level Medium-Thickness Cloud Area Fraction

clmtkisccp.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)
clmtkisccp.long_name: ISCCP Middle Level Thick Cloud Area Fraction

cltStderr.comment: for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Include both large-scale and convective cloud.

co2s.comment: As co2, but only at the surface

dos.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land
dos.comment: (unitless) degree of soil saturation for comparing mass based models with volumetric observations.

dosStderr.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land

dpn2o.comment: Positive values correspond to higher partial pressure in sea water than air.
dpn2o.long_name: Surface Nitrous Oxide (N2O) Partial Pressure Difference between Sea Water and Air

fapar.long_name: Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation

gppStderr.comment: Standard deviation calculated based on median absolute deviation
gppStderr.long_name: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Gross Primary Production on Land Error

hurStderr.comment: The relative humidity with respect to liquid water for T> 0 C, and with respect to ice for T<0 C.

lapserate.comment: Atmospheric lapse rate calculated as -dT/dz in K per km.

lwcre.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

lweGrace.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land

lwp.comment: The total mass of liquid water in cloud per unit area.

n2oflux.comment: Positive flux is into the atmosphere.
n2oflux.long_name: Surface Upward Ocean to Atmosphere Mole Flux of Nitrous Oxide (N2O)

n2os.comment: As n2o, but only at the surface
n2os.long_name: Mole Fraction of N2O at Surface

netcre.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

od550aerStderr.comment: AOD error from the ambient aerosls (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types.
od550aerStderr.long_name: Ambient Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550 nm Error

od870aerStderr.comment: AOD error from the ambient aerosls (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types.
od870aerStderr.long_name: Ambient Aerosol Optical Thickness at 870 nm Error

prStderr.comment: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases from all types of clouds (both large-scale and convective)

prl.comment: large scale precipitation at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases from all types of clouds (both large-scale and convective)

prodlnox.comment: Production NOX (NO+NO2) by lightning globally integrated
prodlnox.long_name: Tendency of atmosphere mass content of NOx from lightning

ptype.comment: Description of numerical values can be found in GRIB2 - CODE TABLE 4.201

rlns.comment: difference between downward and upward thermal radiation at the surface of the Earth

rlnstcs.comment: to surface and outer space (For definition see: DeAngelis et al. 2015)
rlnstcs.long_name: Net Atmospheric Longwave Cooling assuming clear sky

rlntcs.comment: at the top of the atmosphere
rlntcs.long_name: TOA Net downward Longwave Radiation assuming clear sky

rlut.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

rsns.comment: amount of solar radiation that reaches the surface of the Earth minus the amount reflected by the Earth's surface

rsnstcs.long_name: Heating from Shortwave Absorption assuming clear sky

rsnstcsnorm.long_name: Heating from Shortwave Absorption assuming clear sky normalized by incoming solar radiation

rsnt.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

rsntcs.comment: at the top of the atmosphere
rsntcs.long_name: TOA Net downward Shortwave Radiation assuming clear sky

rsut.comment: at the top of the atmosphere

rtnt.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

rx1day.cell_methods: time: sum within days time: maximum over days
rx1day.comment: ETCCDI (Extreme climate change index) annual/monthly maximum 1-day precipitation

rx5day.cell_methods: time: sum within days time: maximum over days
rx5day.comment: ETCCDI (Extreme climate change index) annual/monthly maximum 5-day precipitation

siextent.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

sispeed.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
sispeed.comment: Speed of ice (i.e. mean absolute velocity) to account for back-and-forth movement of the ice

sithick.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
sithick.comment: Actual (floe) thickness of sea ice (NOT volume divided by grid area as was done in CMIP5)

sm.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land
sm.comment: the volume of water in all phases in a thin surface soil layer.
sm.long_name: Volumetric Moisture in Upper Portion of Soil Column

sm1m.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land
sm1m.comment: the volume of water in all phases in the upper 1 metre of the soil column
sm1m.long_name: Volumetric Moisture in Upper 1 Metre of Soil Column

smStderr.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where land
smStderr.comment: Error of the volume of water in all phases in a thin surface soil layer.
smStderr.long_name: Volumetric Moisture in Upper Portion of Soil Column Error

soz.comment: stratospheric ozone column calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU. Here, the stratosphere is defined as the region where O3 mole fraction >= 125 ppb.
soz.long_name: Stratospheric Ozone Column (O3 mole fraction >= 125 ppb)

swcre.comment: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

tcw.long_name: Mass Fraction of Cloud Total Water (liquid + ice)

tnn.comment: ETCCDI (Extreme climate change index) annual/monthly minimum value of daily minimum temperature
tnn.long_name: Annual/monthly minimum value of daily minimum temperature

toz.comment: Total ozone column calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU.

tozStderr.comment: Total ozone column error calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU.

troz.comment: tropospheric ozone column calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU. Here, the troposphere is defined as the region where O3 mole fraction < 125 ppb.
troz.long_name: Tropospheric Ozone Column (O3 mole fraction < 125 ppb)

tsLSSysErrDay.long_name: uncertainty from large-scale systematic errors daytime

tsLSSysErrNight.long_name: uncertainty from large-scale systematic errors night time

tsLocalAtmErrDay.long_name: uncertainty from locally correlated errors on atmospheric scales daytime

tsLocalAtmErrNight.long_name: uncertainty from locally correlated errors on atmospheric scales night time

tsLocalSfcErrDay.long_name: uncertainty from locally correlated errors on surface scales daytime

tsLocalSfcErrNight.long_name: uncertainty from locally correlated errors on surface scales night time

tsStderr.comment: ""skin"" temperature error (i.e., SST for open ocean)

tsTotalDay.long_name: total uncertainty of land surface temperature daytime

tsTotalNight.long_name: total uncertainty of land surface temperature night time

tsUnCorErrNight.long_name: uncertainty from uncorrelated errors night time

tsVarNight.long_name: land surface temperature variance night time

txx.comment: ETCCDI (Extreme climate change index) annual/monthly maximum value of daily maximum temperature
txx.long_name: Annual/monthly maximum value of daily maximum temperature

uajet.long_name: Jet position expressed as latitude of maximum meridional wind speed

vegfrac.comment: Fraction of entire grid cell that is not covered by bare soil.

xch4.comment: Satellite retrieved column-average dry-air mole fraction of atmospheric methane (XCH4)
xch4.long_name: Column-average Dry-air Mole Fraction of Atmospheric Methane

xco2.comment: Satellite retrieved column-average dry-air mole fraction of atmospheric carbon dioxide (XCO2)
xco2.long_name: Column-average Dry-air Mole Fraction of Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide
